trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 主控集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn 類別是特殊的類型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類別，用來以邏輯方式表示二進位狀態主機儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn 具有相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>中每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>的交集它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料格提供類似於使用者介面 (UI)<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，核取方塊儲存格的值是用於存放裝置，例如任何其他資料，或執行大量作業。

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要立即當使用者按一下核取方塊儲存格，您可以處理回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>事件，但是此事件發生於儲存格的值會更新之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在按一下時需要新的值，其中一個選項是計算預期的值將會根據目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: 另一種方法是立即認可變更，並處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>該回應的事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在按下儲存格時，請認可變更，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref>類別的預設狀態。

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 使用此預設建構函式相當於提供的引數`false`至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref>並設定它來顯示兩個或三個狀態的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化資料行，藉由設定下列屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|The value of the `threeState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>屬性初始化為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>`threeState`參數值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|值`threeState`參數。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性所傳回。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性所傳回。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要顯示核取方塊，以三種狀態。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>顯示有兩個狀態的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立新的儲存格的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>類別初始化至新建立的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>這個屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>的建構函式

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，後建立模型資料行中的所有資料格。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 屬性設定為值的類型不是， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>有以下的初始屬性值: |`DataGridViewCellStyle`屬性 |預設值 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|如果初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>`true`，否則`false`。 | 這些值會覆寫中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>的控制項，但是可能會覆寫其他儲存格樣式屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 屬性所傳回的物件屬性的值為`false`、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>屬性值設定為`true`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>屬性值設定為`false`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>至`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>来套用為預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對應的儲存格值的基礎值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，此時會顯示為未核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>屬性會決定相關聯的值，這些狀態的基礎資料來源中發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>屬性所傳回的資料格物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表值，這個資料行中的資料格會視為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的核取方塊儲存格的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示使用視覺化樣式的核取方塊儲存格，將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>呼叫此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，再<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>屬性所傳回的資料格物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>值，指出資料行中的儲存格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對應不定的基礎值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>資料格會顯示為已停用核取方塊的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>，和 IndeterminateValue 屬性會決定這些狀態的相關聯的值，如同它們在基礎資料來源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>屬性所傳回的資料格物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表值，這個資料行中的資料格會視為不確定的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許三個核取狀態而非兩個裝載核取方塊儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: 不確定的狀態非常有用，例如，當您不想設定核取方塊的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>屬性所傳回的資料格物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the ThreeState property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性的值為`false`，變更要 ThreeState 屬性值`true`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the ThreeState property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>，變更要 ThreeState 屬性值`false`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>至`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝載<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>物件是能夠擁有第三個、 不確定的狀態; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資料行的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述資料行。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對應的儲存格值的基礎值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，此時會顯示為已核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>，TrueValue，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>屬性會決定相關聯的值，這些狀態的基礎資料來源中發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>屬性所傳回的資料格物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示資料格會視為值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
